citations.narrative:
***Upon arrival at the facility address USDA found that the facility was no longer there. Contact was made with the
licensee at the second facility where USDA was informed that previous address had been sold and all animals moved to
another location. The Licensee failed to notify USDA as required in Section 2.27 (a) of the AWA Regulations. The current
license is no longer valid.
A registrant shall notify the Deputy Administrator by certified mail of any change in the name, address, or ownership, or
other change in operations affecting its status as an exhibitor, carrier, or intermediate handler, within 10 days after making
such change.
Corrected June 11, 2025 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.27(a) 
   
Notification of change of operation. 
***Upon arrival at the facility address USDA found that the facility was no longer there. Contact was made with the 
licensee at the second facility where USDA was informed that previous address had been sold and all animals moved to 
another location. The Licensee failed to notify USDA as required in Section 2.27 (a) of the AWA Regulations. The current 
license is no longer valid.  
 
A registrant shall notify the Deputy Administrator by certified mail of any change in the name, address, or ownership, or 
other change in operations affecting its status as an exhibitor, carrier, or intermediate handler, within 10 days after making 
such change. 
 
Corrected June 11, 2025 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
